text: @GeorgeTakei I doubt Spock would have such a persepctive.  Its about being extra careful.  Not to mention, the "hoax" aspect of it was in reference to the degree of drama associated with #covid19 at the time @realDonaldTrump made the statement, not necessarily right now.
